name: Beebo Attempts Magic
description:
Beebo the wizard apprentice is slacking off, and not studying like he should. For an approaching exam, he's looking for alternative ways to pass, and skims through a book and reads about a powerful artifact! He sets off immediately without doing further research, combat severely lacking. It's as if he rolling dice to power his attacks.....

Unlock new enemies and places as you proceed in the game

A 2022 GMTK Jam game made in 48 hours with the theme of "roll the dice". You play as Beebo encountering monsters in search for this dubious artifact. Instead of choosing actions, you roll dice to decide the power of your attacks and defenses. Sometimes you even get elemental attack, but Beebo can of  course not control any of that. Features a basic battle system, visible enemy intents and a charming NES color palette.

For a rundown on the gameplay, see here. To fix any camera or viewport issues, toggle fullscreen on and off (bottom right corner).

Credits:

Programmers: Krish Ganatra, Angelo Marney

Designer: Sten

Musician: BobbyDigital

Artists: SlappyGrandPappy, Get Scribbl'd, RhyMax

Playtester: Rusheel
